answer:
<p>Check out <a href="http://docs.python.org/3/library/time.html#time.strptime" rel="noreferrer">strptime</a> in the <a href="http://docs.python.org/3/library/time.html" rel="noreferrer">time</a> module.  It is the inverse of <a href="http://docs.python.org/3/library/time.html#time.strftime" rel="noreferrer">strftime</a>.</p>

<pre class="lang-py s-code-block"><code class="hljs language-python">$ python
<span class="hljs-meta">&gt;&gt;&gt; </span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> time
<span class="hljs-meta">&gt;&gt;&gt; </span>my_time = time.strptime(<span class="hljs-string">'Jun 1 2005  1:33PM'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'%b %d %Y %I:%M%p'</span>)
time.struct_time(tm_year=<span class="hljs-number">2005</span>, tm_mon=<span class="hljs-number">6</span>, tm_mday=<span class="hljs-number">1</span>,
                 tm_hour=<span class="hljs-number">13</span>, tm_min=<span class="hljs-number">33</span>, tm_sec=<span class="hljs-number">0</span>,
                 tm_wday=<span class="hljs-number">2</span>, tm_yday=<span class="hljs-number">152</span>, tm_isdst=-<span class="hljs-number">1</span>)

timestamp = time.mktime(my_time)
<span class="hljs-comment"># convert time object to datetime</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> datetime <span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> datetime
my_datetime = datetime.fromtimestamp(timestamp)
<span class="hljs-comment"># convert time object to date</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> datetime <span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> date
my_date = date.fromtimestamp(timestamp)
</code></pre>

<pre class="lang-py s-code-block"><code class="hljs language-python">In [<span class="hljs-number">34</span>]: <span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> datetime

In [<span class="hljs-number">35</span>]: _now = datetime.datetime.now()

In [<span class="hljs-number">36</span>]: _now
Out[<span class="hljs-number">36</span>]: datetime.datetime(<span class="hljs-number">2016</span>, <span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">19</span>, <span class="hljs-number">9</span>, <span class="hljs-number">47</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">432000</span>)

In [<span class="hljs-number">37</span>]: <span class="hljs-built_in">print</span> _now
<span class="hljs-number">2016</span>-01-<span class="hljs-number">19</span> 09:<span class="hljs-number">47</span>:<span class="hljs-number">00.432000</span>

In [<span class="hljs-number">38</span>]: _parsed = datetime.datetime.strptime(<span class="hljs-built_in">str</span>(_now),<span class="hljs-string">"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S.%f"</span>)

In [<span class="hljs-number">39</span>]: _parsed
Out[<span class="hljs-number">39</span>]: datetime.datetime(<span class="hljs-number">2016</span>, <span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">19</span>, <span class="hljs-number">9</span>, <span class="hljs-number">47</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">432000</span>)

In [<span class="hljs-number">40</span>]: <span class="hljs-keyword">assert</span> _now == _parsed
</code></pre>
